author: Flo
content:
Could you have moved a little more to the left and thus avoided that tree? Probably then there would have been something else in the way, lol.

So how about flipping it horizontally? Perhaps you'd like that tree better as a visual stop at the right side? But then that would make the light seem to come from the right, and I like it better coming from the left. Oh what to do, lol?

I like this image anyway, big tree or no. I love the quality of the light and how the light in the background forms an opposite diagonal to the slight diagonal of the twigs in the foreground.
